pages.text: The $(item)Ring of Seasons$(), when equipped and supplied with $(thing)Mana$(), will regulate the body temperature of the player.
The $(item)Gryllzalia$() is a functional flower that uses mana from mana pools to regulate the body temperature of all nearby players.

The $(item)Pure Pitcher$() is a functional flower that uses mana to convert $(water)Water$() source blocks into $(water)Purified Water$(). The $(water)Purified Water$() is stored in the flower and can be extracted by $(k:use)ing the flower while holding an empty fluid container.$(br2)Check out the $(item)Lexica Botania$() entry for more information.
